text: مِّمَّا خَطِيٓـَٔـٰتِهِمْ أُغْرِقُوا۟ فَأُدْخِلُوا۟ نَارًا فَلَمْ يَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارًا

translation.en.sahih: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.
translation.id.indonesian: Disebabkan kesalahan-kesalahan mereka, mereka ditenggelamkan lalu dimasukkan ke neraka, maka mereka tidak mendapat penolong-penolong bagi mereka selain dari Allah.
